Merelin: which version of Mozilla is installed? It has to be Mozilla GTK2 1.4 
to 1.6 if you are running SWT 3.0, or Mozilla GTK2 1.4 to 1.7 if you are 
running with SWT 3.1 Milestone 2 and above.

I removed mozilla 1.7 and installed mozilla 1.6 packages.  
Now I have another exception.  
I can run mozilla using path /usr/bin/mozilla but eclipse can't.

Unknown mozilla path:
You need to set the MOZILLA_FIVE_HOME environment variable to /usr/bin/mozilla 

e.g.

open a terminal
csh
setenv MOZILLA_FIVE_HOME /usr/bin/mozilla
eclipse


Note that this will still fail if the build you installed is not a Mozilla 1.6 
GTK2 build - e.g if it is a Mozilla 1.6 GTK build. Details in the SWT FAQ:

What do I need to run the SWT Browser inside Eclipse on Linux GTK or Linux 
Motif? 
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-swt-
home/faq.html#browserlinux

Closing PR.
Mozilla 1.7GTK2 supported started with 3.1 M2
Incompatible Mozilla GTK1.2 now detected by the SWT Browser (>20041121). 
Instead of causing a crash, the Browser now throws an exception with a message 
saying Mozilla GTK1.2 was detected and cannot be used.
